text: Some Birds Can't Fly () is a 1997 Yugoslav drama film directed by Petar Lalović. == Cast == * Bata Živojinović - Lugar Zdravko * Ivana Surdić - Vesna * Neda Arnerić - Vida * Miodrag Krivokapić - Dusan * Petar Kralj - Dr. Mrvaljevic * Svetlana Bojković - Doktorka * Selimir Tosić - Dr. Petrovic * Jelena Zigon - Uciteljica * Bata Paskaljević - Zeleznicar * Ljiljana Gazdić - Professor muzike * Dusan Asković - Otac bolesnog deteta * Božidar Pavićević - Lovokradica I * Miroljub Leso - Lovokradica II == External links == * Category:1997 drama films Category:Yugoslav films Category:Serbian films Category:Serbian drama films Category:Yugoslav drama films
title: Some Birds Can't Fly
